TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITextControl

summary.span: 定义控件实现以获取或设置其文本内容的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface a control implements to get or set its text content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义 控件实现以允许获取或设置其文本内容的属性。The interface defines the property a control implements to allow the getting or setting of its text content. 可以通过编程方式或通过用户输入来设置属性。The property can be set programmatically or through user input. > [!CAUTION] > 实现此接口的控件可用于显示用户输入。A control implementing this interface can be used to display user input. 在显示用户输入之前，必须检查输入中是否有恶意的客户端脚本，如可执行脚本或 SQL 语句。Before displaying user input, the input must be checked for malicious client script, such as executable script or SQL statements. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现接口的自定义控件 。The following code example shows a custom control that implements the interface. 如果传递到属性，则默认值将分配给该属性 `null` 。A default value is assigned to the property if `null` is passed to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/CS/CustomTextControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/VB/CustomTextControl.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的文本内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of a control.
The text content of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过编程方式或通过用户输入来设置属性。The property can be set programmatically or through user input. > [!CAUTION] > 实现此接口的控件可用于显示用户输入。A control implementing this interface can be used to display user input. 在显示用户输入之前，必须检查输入中是否有恶意的客户端脚本，如可执行脚本或 SQL 语句。Before displaying user input, the input must be checked for malicious client script, such as executable script or SQL statements. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现接口的自定义控件 。The following code example shows a custom control that implements the interface. 如果传递到属性，则默认值将分配给该属性 `null` 。A default value is assigned to the property if `null` is passed to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/CS/CustomTextControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/VB/CustomTextControl.vb#1)]
